itemListElement.name: Quick Spiced Cabbage stir fry (Patta gobi ki Subzi)

@graph.name: Quick Spiced Cabbage Stir Fry (Patta Gobi Ki Subzi)
@graph.description: This quick spiced cabbage stir fry is an easy, delicious and healthy main dish. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  dry red chili pepper ((more or less by taste))
1 teaspoon yellow mung lentils/daal ((skinless split mung beans))

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat on medium heat for 2 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and heat on medium heat for 2 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add in mustard seeds when the oil is hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in mustard seeds when the oil is hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in asofetida. Break the red chili pepper and add to the oil and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in asofetida. Break the red chili pepper and add to the oil and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garlic and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garlic and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the turmeric and the daal/beans and mix for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the turmeric and the daal/beans and mix for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in th cabbage and salt and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes stirring occassionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in th cabbage and salt and mix well. Cover and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes stirring occassionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Roti ,Naan or rice, with pickles or daal/lentil curry!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Roti ,Naan or rice, with pickles or daal/lentil curry!

@graph.keywords: 30 minute meal, easy recipe, healthy stir fry
